mapper.sql: WITH config AS (SELECT (SELECT conf_value FROM ciams_config WHERE id = 'SIDO_CODE') AS sido, (SELECT conf_value FROM ciams_config WHERE id = 'SGG_CODE') AS sgg), matched_scope AS (SELECT cis.category, cis.priority, cia.cls_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY cia.cls_code ) AS rn FROM ciams_industry_analysis cia LEFT JOIN ciams_industry_scope cis ON ( (LENGTH(cis.c_code) <= 3 AND cia.cls_code LIKE cis.c_code || '%') OR (LENGTH(cis.c_code) > 3 AND cia.cls_code = LEFT(cis.c_code, 3)) ) WHERE cia.sgg_cd = (SELECT sido || sgg FROM config))
FROM ciams_industry_analysis cia INNER JOIN ciams_industry_area ciarea ON ciarea.sgg_cd = cia.sgg_cd AND ciarea.use_yn = true LEFT JOIN matched_scope ms ON ms.cls_code = cia.cls_code AND ms.rn = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT ciarea.sgg_cd, ciarea.sgg_nm, ms.category, get_cd_nm(cia.t_code || cia.cls_code, '') AS ins_nm, cia.t_code, cia.cls_code, cia.lq_value, cia.lq_class, cia.gr_value, cia.gr_class, cia.rs_value, cia.rs_class, cia.ita_rec, cia.lq_rec, cia.corp_cnt, cia.worker_cnt
WHERE
ORDER BY ms.category, cia.t_code, cia.cls_code, ciarea.priority

SELECT sgg_cd, sgg_nm FROM ciams_industry_area cia WHERE use_yn = true
AND cia.sgg_cd != ( SELECT conf_value || conf_value_2 FROM ( SELECT (SELECT conf_value FROM ciams_config WHERE id = 'SIDO_CODE') AS conf_value, (SELECT conf_value FROM ciams_config WHERE id = 'SGG_CODE') AS conf_value_2 ) config )
ORDER BY priority
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ciams_industry_analysis WHERE sgg_cd = #{sggCd}

SELECT t_code, cls_code, REGEXP_REPLACE(get_cd_nm(t_code, ''), '\([^)]*\)', '') AS code_nm, get_cd_nm(t_code || cls_code, '') AS ins_nm, lq_value, lq_class, gr_value, gr_class, rs_value, rs_class, ita_rec, lq_rec, corp_cnt, worker_cnt FROM ciams_industry_analysis WHERE sgg_cd = #{sggCd} ORDER BY t_code, cls_code
